title: Client window closes after game
body:
So this has been happening almost every game and it's really starting to annoy me, especially the games where reports need to be given for feeders and afk's in ranked specifically. 

After the game is finished and i click the continue button the window closes and doesn't come back up with end game stats etc, the client is still active as to log back in i have to close it via the Task Manager, this has ONLY happened since the 5.14 patch, haven't seen any information on this, anyone else had this issue? is there already a fix?
